public class HealthPotion extends Potion
HealthPotions increase the consumer's mana

    • additionalOutputString

      public String additionalOutputString()
      returns "; +'health' HP". e.g. (total result of toString) "[Health Potion; 1 g; 1 Knut; 5 gulps; +10 HP]"
      Overrides:
      additionalOutputString in class MagicItem
      Returns:

    • useOn

      public void useOn(MagicEffectRealization target)
      If usages is greater than 0 reduce usages by 1 (tryUsage method) and increase HP of target by health (call method heal(health))
      Parameters:
      target - target on which to object is to be used on
